Structure# MutableSpan

iOS 12.2+iPadOS 12.2+Mac Catalyst 12.2+macOS 10.14.4+tvOS 12.2+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.2+

```
@frozen
struct MutableSpan<Element> where Element : ~Copyable
```

## [See Also](/documentation/swift/mutablespan#see-also)

### [Safe Memory Access](/documentation/swift/mutablespan#Safe-Memory-Access)

[`struct Span`](/documentation/swift/span)`Span<Element>` represents a contiguous region of memory which contains initialized instances of `Element`.[`struct RawSpan`](/documentation/swift/rawspan)`RawSpan` represents a contiguous region of memory which contains initialized bytes.[`struct OutputSpan`](/documentation/swift/outputspan)[`struct UTF8Span`](/documentation/swift/utf8span)A borrowed view into contiguous memory that contains validly-encoded UTF-8 code units.[`struct MutableRawSpan`](/documentation/swift/mutablerawspan)
